a1: Standard 5-field cron: minute (0-59), hour (0-23), day of month (1-31), month (1-12), day of week (0-6, Sunday=0).
a2: Yes, supports * (every), / (step), - (range), and , (list) in all fields.
q3: How accurate are the next run times?
a3: Very accurate. They are calculated based on the current system time and the cron expression rules.
